title.rendered: DF18: Deliver Personalized Content with CMS and Audience Targeting on Community Cloud

content.rendered:
Deliver Personalized Content with CMS and Audience Targeting on Community Cloud
Dreamforce 2018DevZone


Our Presentation

Overview
Hear from 4 Community Cloud Experts on the latest and Greatest available for Content Management!  Learn how easy it is to seamlessly integrate your Content Management System (CMS) into Lightning Communities with CMS Connect. Introducing our Native Content Management Solution, you can start creating and managing your content in Salesforce to serve CRM-powered personalization to your users.Previously, creating an integration to a separate CMS would require intensive development work and a system other than salesforce to hold your content.  When Salesforce rolled out CMS Connect they took that time from months to minutes.  Now, with Winter 18 and Native CMS you can create and manage your content in Salesforce via custom and standard objects or you can use the new Community Workspace to create and distribute content for your communities as well.  With the added functionality of Audience Targeting, you can create beautiful pages and views with dynamic content based on the logged in user.  Find out more in this session.

The Presenters



Meighan Brodkey

CMS ConnectSenior Community Cloud Specialist | Salesforce MVP, System Dot Debug 

Meighan’s Twitter



Neil Hayek

Emcee  Product Management Director, Salesforce

Contact Neil



Shubhi Goyal

Native CMSSenior Software Engineer, Salesforce

Contact Shubhi



Rohan Pande

Audience TargetingSoftware Engineering Manager, Salesforce

Contact Rohan
